729176f-b.title: Richmond: Morningstar Road - Wenlock Street
729176f-b.text:
(1)
Morningstar Road, east side, at the head of Wenlock Street
(formerly Mersereau Ave.). In 1874, according to Beers's map of
that year, it was the J. Mersereau house. In 1898 (8romley's map)
it was owned by Mrs. John T. Mersereau and later, according to
Bromley's 1907 and 1917 maps, to Domeico Volpe.
March 24, 1928.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The saWke, at a later date, showing the house to be untenanted.
May 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729176f-b.folder: Morningstar Road & Wenlock Street, Staten Island, NY

729169f-a.title: Richmond: Morningstar Road - Wenlock Street
729169f-a.text:
479 Morningstar Road, east side, between Wenclock Street and
Westbrook Avenue. Robinson's 1898 map shows it to have belonged to
P. Hoerle.
May 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
